titles.title: Insular Rate for Cellular Customers Act
To require rate integration for wireless interstate toll charges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 12/16/2005--Introduced. Insular Rate for Cellular Customers Act - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to state that, for purposes of rate integration for wireless interstate telecommunications services, a provider of a commercial mobile radio service shall, with respect to any interstate services for which there are separately-stated toll charges, be treated as a provider of interstate, interexchange telecommunications services.
